H0.text: What is the name for the playing area in American football. Pitch

H1.text: What is the name for the playing area in American football. Field of Play

H2.text: What is the name for the playing area in American football. Turf

H3.text: What is the name for the playing area in American football. Gridiron

A4.text: The 100 yards between the goal lines where most gameplay occurs is officially called the 'field of play' in the NFL rulebook.

A5.text: This appearance led to the use of the term 'gridiron' in the 1880s.

A6.text: American football field is the playing area for American football.
